title: Arrest made in connection with Austin mass shooting
content:
Autoplay:Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
An arrest has been made in connection with a shooting in downtown Austin on Sunday morning that killed one and injured four others.
The Austin Statesman reports that Endicott McCray has been arrested in connection with the shooting at a train station in eastern Atlanta.
The 24-year-old McCray was wanted for the murder of Teqnika Marie Moultrie, who was killed in Sunday’s shootout.
